title: Tiru Restaurant Management System
description: A full-stack Restaurant Management System built for Tiru Solutions, a startup focused on streamlining restaurant operations.
Features include menu management, table reservations, order tracking, POS integration, inventory control, staff scheduling, and real-time analytics dashboards.
Provides separate interfaces for restaurant admins, staff, and customers with secure role-based access.
Integrates payment processing and supports online ordering for seamless customer experience.
Designed to be scalable and customizable for various restaurant types and sizes.
